text: Have you ever though about donating to Save the Children?
I have thought about it before. I've been approached by people on the street.
It is a really great charity. It helps children who have been in crisis.
Is the charity international? Or do they operate primarily in America?
It donates all over the world including America.
What is the purpose of the charity?
To help children in crisis. Right now they Stand Ready to Help Hawaii Kids and Families as Powerful Hurricane Lane Closes in
That's really a great cause. Unfortunately I don't have much money right now to help.
Anything is helpful. You can donate as little as a $1
I don't know that I can donate a dollar. I've been working really hard to save every dollar that I can to make sure I can pay my bills.
You can donate right now right from your task payment
I don't know if I'd necessarily feel comfortable donating. I feel like a lot of charities squander the money and don't actually use all the donations for what is promised.
If you donate from your task payment today the research team will collect all donations and send it to Save the Children.
Is there anyway that I can be guaranteed the money will go towards what is promised?
No, you just have to trust the requester will do the right think
Are there any other charities I can donate to? Or is it just save the children?
No, today is just the Save the Children.
Is there any way that I could donate less than a dollar? I don't want to donate a dollar, but would consider donating something less.
You can choose any amount from $0 to all of your payment for this task. So yes you can less
I would be willing to donate 5 cents today. I know it's not a lot, but it's all I'm willing to afford today.
